alert.note: Alert for Baker; Southern Columbia; Union (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 4:26AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of southern Baker, northern Union and southern Columbia Counties through 445 AM EDT... At 426 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty shower near Columbia, or 9 miles northeast of Ichetucknee Spring, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Glen St. Mary, Palestine Community, Providence, Lulu, Olustee and Sanderson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
